content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Make smooth skin a priority and save up to 35% on each visit.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1562683642492{padding-right: 10% !important;}”][vc_column_text]

How it works

We believe that you shouldn’t worry about how much money you’re going to spend on your sugaring. So we invented unlimited packages.

Stop by our locations and choose your package. Book as often as you wish and when it’s most convenient for you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Less hair in a year
When you sugar more frequently, you can catch the hair at the first stage of growth (the hair is attached to the follicle wall). Sugaring those hairs actually leads to permanency.

Less painful
The more you do Sugaring, the weaker your
hair root becomes. Which makes it less and less
painful every time you visit us.

Healthy smooth skin
Picture this: no razor bumps, no burns, no ingrowns…[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″][/vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1562683627307{padding-right: 10% !important;}”][/vc_column]
